welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kresek, Indonesia! Get ready to be enchanted by our beautiful beaches, vibrant culture, and delicious cuisine. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Soekarno-Hatta International Airport, serving domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second terminal at Soekarno-Hatta International Airport, serving domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and most modern terminal at Soekarno-Hatta International Airport, serving domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and connectivity during peak hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pondok Cabe Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Pondok Cabe Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
